post.description: This endpoint adds a new athlete.

delete.description: This endpoint deletes an athlete by its ID.

put.description: This endpoint edits an existing athlete.

get.description: This endpoint retrieves an athlete by its ID.
This endpoint retrieves all athletes with pagination and optional filters.

post.description: This endpoint for logging in user.
This endpoint for refreshing access token using refresh token.
This endpoint adds a new country.

delete.description: This endpoint deletes a country by its ID.

put.description: This endpoint edits an existing country.

get.description: This endpoint retrieves a country by its ID.
This endpoint retrieves all countries with pagination.

post.description: This endpoint adds a new event.

delete.description: This endpoint deletes an event by its ID.

put.description: This endpoint edits an existing event.

get.description: This endpoint retrieves an event by its ID.
This endpoint retrieves all events with pagination.
This endpoint searches events by query with pagination.

post.description: This endpoint adds a new medal.

delete.description: This endpoint deletes a medal by its ID.

put.description: This endpoint edits an existing medal.

get.description: This endpoint retrieves a medal by its ID.
This endpoint retrieves all medals with pagination and optional filters.
This endpoint retrieves the ranking of countries based on medals.

post.description: This endpoint sends an event to the streaming service.
post.summary: Send an event to the streaming service
